Halal Food Hong Kong caters to every culinary desire, including a wide range of halal food. For all Muslims, for the meat of a land animal to be Halal, it must be slaughtered by a Muslim who pronounces the name of Allah before killing the animal by cutting its throat.
Muslim visitors will have no difficulty in finding halal food. However, some if not most of these outlets serve liquor. Muslim visitors are advised to enquire before patronising.
